DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare two method pelvic floor muscle training : reference method versus CMP ® method ( ( Connaissance et Maîtrise de Périnée : Knowledge Control Perineum )
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Programs Reeducation Urinary Incontinence Woman
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old less 75 year Patients present urinary incontinence effort mix symptomatic associate pelvic static disorder Patients perineale reeducation prescription Patients affiliate national insurance scheme benefit program Patients give write consent form Nulliparous woman Patients already operated incontinence Patients prolapse high level stage II classification POPQ ( Pelvic Organ Prolapse Quantification ) Pregnant woman Patients present associate anal incontinence , Patients present cancellation ( section marrow , syringomyelia example ) inversion perineum control Patients give birth le 6 month care Patients benefit pelvipérinéale reeducation previous 12 month , Patients present psychiatric disease Patients present vaginismus , Patients present contraindication practice electrostimulation .
